ygData.subject: RE: Polished Mithril Torque
ygData.msgSnippet: heheheh so you didnt see My rave on this 3 weeks ago ehhh? ;) ... From: Heather Daley [mailto:blushn@hotmail.com] Sent: Tuesday, September 21, 1999 9:37 AM To:
ygData.messageBody:
heheheh so you didnt see My rave on this 3 weeks ago ehhh? ;)

-----Original Message-----
From: Heather Daley [mailto:blushn@...]
Sent: Tuesday, September 21, 1999 9:37 AM
To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ-Clerics] Polished Mithril Torque


From: "Heather Daley" <blushn@...>

Ok who is the brains behind this item??
I was looking through EQitems webpage and happened upon this item.


Polished Mithril Torque AC 7 Int +13, Wis +13 4.0WT
Class:Wr,Pl,Rn,Sk,Mn,Bd,Rg Race:All

Ok let me get this straight Pally,Rangers and SK use wis/int for mana ok i
think they may be interested in it(honestly all of them are more interested
in Dex and agi items), It is too damn heavy for a monk to even consider
wearing and what on gods green earth do Warriors, Bards and Rogues need it
for. This just boggles my mind.

<bonks herself on the head>
Does anyone else think this is a good Clr Dru Sha Nec Wiz Enc Mag item?
Seems Verant does that quite often, giving items to all the classes but the
one who could benefit from it the most.

<looks around in a confused manner>
Bree Wyndsdale
47th Cleric of Fennin Ro
High Priestess of MoD
